<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> serves as the leaf of the Hierarchical Control-Flow Graph.

It holds a sequence of zero or more VPRecipe&#39;s each representing a sequence of output IR instructions. All PHI-like recipes must come before any non-PHI recipes.

Definition at line 3539 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

## Private Constructors

### VPBasicBlock() {#a4bd3b92852b9f1a549ca0c705030e281}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::VPBasicBlock::VPBasicBlock (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp; Name=&quot;&quot;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vprecipebase">VPRecipeBase</a> &#42; Recipe=nullptr)</>}

Note that the numbering is applied to the whole <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>, so printing individual blocks is consistent with the whole <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> printing.
